name: McLeanLittleLeague
0:
”Alexa, ask McLean Little League for the latest news”
”Text that to me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mclean little league
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay up to date on the latest news from McLean Little League. With this skill you can...

* Hear the latest McLean Little League Facebook posts
* Have any post texted to your phone. If you hear a post you are interested in, just say "text that to me" and a link to the post will be texted to your phone. If this is the first time you've used this feature, the skill will ask you to speak your cell phone number so it knows where to send the text.

A great way to keep informed using just your voice.
